additional_requirement: Focus on case studies where misinformation had a direct impact on public safety.
Concentrate on misinformation that influenced public health policies and safety practices.
Discuss the impact on vaccination rates and public health, avoiding overly technical medical details.
Focus on diseases with potential for global impact, excluding well-controlled diseases.
Explore ethical dilemmas in recent technologies impacting personal safety and privacy.
Highlight cases with significant implications for personal or public safety.
Discuss controversies and safety concerns related to surveillance and misidentification.
Focus on accidents with significant safety lessons or long-term health implications.
Explore the ongoing safety and health impacts rather than the technical details of the accident itself.
Highlight diseases identified within the last decade with potential for widespread impact.
